LanguageData.Mutant_shadow.label: Shadow
LanguageData.Mutant_shadow.description: Originally designed for construction and heavy industry, the Ogron™ is a large, tough, thickheaded xenohuman. In rimworld condition, Many feral clans use them as brutal war beasts.
LanguageData.Mutant_shadow.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Mutant_shadow.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Mutant_shadow.tools.2.label: head
